document_data.mainbody:
alandro Luna was a performer who lived in the Sword Coast North during the late 15 century DR.
Galandros greatest joy in life was seeing joy in the audiences for whom he performed. While he was a skilled musician, Galandro was also quite adept at dishing out insults. He had a good sense of humor and did not mind them returned in kind.
His most beloved item was his fiddle, which was given to him as a gift by a dear friend.
Galandros aim in life was to become famous and earn great acclaim as a musician. He would do just about anything to achieve this goal.
